00094   void NumUsersForSimilarity(const size_t num)
00095   {
00096     if (num < 1)
00097     {
00098       Log::Warn << "CF::NumUsersForSimilarity(): invalid value (< 1) "
00099           "ignored." << std::endl;

00101     }

00103   }
